inclusion.criterion: biliary pain or complications of gallstones (pancreatitis, cholangitis, cholecystitis)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient experienced similar pain twice in the past year.

inclusion.criterion: Gallbladder removal because biliary pain or gallstones complications
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: information due to mental disorders or language barrier; and severe postoperative complications
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: complications which could affect the assessment of quality of life after cholecystectomy.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of hypercholesterolemia and two C/sections, but these conditions do not seem to be directly related to the current symptoms. The patient's overall health appears to be stable, with no severe postoperative complications mentioned.
